left.title: TRAGEDY AT MORIA: MEGA ROOM COLLAPSE!
left.subhead: Mining Operations Halted on 2nd Floor; Ducks Mourned.
paragraphs: Disaster struck the Dwarven halls of Moria yesterday.
While miraculously no Dwarves were injured, two ducks were lost.

left.title: DWARVEN INGENUITY BREACHES NEW FRONTIERS
paragraphs: Engineers celebrated the invention of the Water Wheel.
Blast Furnace efficiency has reached its peak.

middle.title: OFFICIAL DECREE: THE INDUSTRIAL PAUSE
paragraphs: HEAR YE! By order of the Server Administration.
Technological progression is hereby BLOCKADED at Medium Voltage (MV).

middle.title: THE GREAT ROMAN TRADE HUB
paragraphs: A massive trade hub has been announced for Rome.

right.title: ENVIRONMENTAL CONCERNS IN ROME
paragraphs: Qin Shi Huang has raised alarms regarding massive garbage accumulation.
The server's first major environmental debate has begun.

items: LOCAL WITCH DECREE: All must receive moss.
HERMIT REGRETS choosing to live too far away.
SURVIVAL FAIL: Sabertooth kill, hide lost in river.
SPA DAY GONE WRONG: Tashania stuck in thermal spring.
